title: Haste Plants
data:
{{obsolete}}

'''Haste Plants''' is a monsters-only spell that gives all [[plant]] [[holiness]] monsters within [[line of sight]] of the caster [[haste]], decreasing the time it takes them to perform any action by 33%.

Currently, there aren't any monsters able to cast Haste Plants.

==History==
Haste Plants was added in [[0.13]], likely in expectation of the [[Enchanted Forest]] branch, but removed when the one monster capable of casting it ([[spriggan druid]]s) had their spell lists updated.

[[Category:Monster spells]]
